verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stock markets] [V: rebound] [ARGM-ADV: on chinese export data] and a report of a trump - xi meeting next month the aim of the talks is to find a way out of the impasse over trade that has led both countries to impose tariffs united states export los angeles times china
